column4: when i am choosing what partitions I want on the ubuntu liunux install . . . it says mount point . . what am I supposed to do for that>\

Guys can someone pleas help me . . . what does it mean when it gives me the option MOUNT POINT when I am preparing partitions on the ubuntu install? what should I select for the partition that will have the os on it etc etc?
use / on which partation u want to install ubuntu
